leaflet.personalStatement: Stephen was born and raised in Northern Ireland before heading to Kingston University. While there he first got involved in local politics with the Liberal Democrats, something that he carried on in various locations he has settled since.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet mainly provides information about Stephen Glenn's background and a general message about building a fairer society. Specific policy areas are not detailed in the extracted text.
